snippet: Dell may be promoting its $24.4 billion leveraged buyout as the next step in its turnaround plan. But some of the computer maker's rivals, including Lenovo and H.P., couldn't resist throwing a few jabs at the company all the same.
abstract: Dell may be promoting its $24.4 billion leveraged buyout as the next step in its turnaround plan. But some of the computer maker's rivals, including Lenovo and H.P., couldn't resist throwing a few jabs at the company all the same.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Rivals Don't Mean to Rain on Dell's Parade, but ...
